PreChat.prechat:
If you want to try, go to the free chat
If you have an active subscription, go to the VIP chatğŸ’
PreChat.difference:
VIP subscribers have dedicated resources for chatting with the GPT, thus free and paid requests are processed in two separate streams
Also, in the VIP stream, requests are processed a bit faster (though you might not notice the difference as the processing of free requests is also quick)

Customization.customization: Here you can set a specific style and provide some information for the GPT chat
Customization.description:
ğŸ”¸ Style: this is where you define the tone of your chat with GPT. Whether you prefer a casual, humorous, romantic, or educational tone, the choice is yours. GPT will adhere to the selected style
ğŸ”¸ Information: use this section to provide GPT with specific information, such as if you're studying 10th-grade math or preparing for a psychology exam. Any detail you share will be taken into account during the conversation

About.about: What is Chat GPT-4 Access Plus?
About.product: Chat GPT is a modern technological marvel capable of creating texts, answering almost any question, generating ideas, and simply being a pleasant conversationalist. However, accessing this tool can be challenging, expensive, and problematic due to the large number of users. That's why we introduced "GPT-4 Access Plus"
